mapper.select: select p.* from dg_role_permission rp,dg_permission p where rp.permission_id = p.id and rp.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT p.* FROM tb_user AS u LEFT JOIN tb_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_role_permission AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
